orgverse:
को निह्श्वसितुमर्हसि प्रचोद मुनिपुङ्गव।
किं वादेन किमुक्तेन नियमैः किं च कर्मणा॥
translation: Valmiki, the best of sages, after having received him respectfully, inquired of Narada, the foremost of speakers, 'O Sage, what is it you wish to express? What may I do for you? And by what speech or what act or what spiritual practice shall I serve you?'
